title: [EDIT] Thanking whoever added Illaoi's "Tentakill!" line. <3
body:
Checked the wiki and it's true. I'm satisfied. I don't know why Illaoi has been my favorite champ since she came out, and had no idea she was Lore-linked to Gangplank but I started playing them both around the same time. Thank you Riot.

{{champion:41}} {{champion:420}}

replies.body:
Jimmy Steorts, game designer for the champ requested it and put the tech in for it to trigger (sadly left rito).  I “wrote” it for him and directed the vo session.


For years I’ve been hoping to hear it in a game — never have.

Well thanks to both of you. Everything about Illaoi is amazing, especially her VO. You can really feel her confident presence in everything she says, which really fueled my desire to reach Mastery 7 on her.  

Is there any source for a translation of her quotes that aren't in English?
